role.argrole: place arg0 goes to and hides

example.parse: (IP-OBJ (LCP-TMP (NP (NN 预演)) (LC 时)) (PU ，) (IP (NP-SBJ (NN 蛋糕)) (VP (VV 打到) (NP-OBJ (NN 公主)))) (PU ，) (IP (NP-SBJ (NN 公主)) (VP (VP (ADVP (AD 不但)) (ADVP (AD 真的)) (VP (VA 痛) (DER 得) (VP-EXT (VRD (VV 哭) (VV 出来))))) (PU ，) (VP (ADVP (AD 还)) (VP (VV 躲到) (NP-OBJ (NN 後台))) (VP (ADVP (AD 不)) (VP (VV 演) (AS 了)))))))
